description: Dashboard lab to monitorize state of Cassandra cluster

panels.description: Total Disk space used by instance
panels.title: Total Disk space used

panels.description:
The "Compaction" is a process that merge SSTable files to delete duplicate data or old data.

This metric shows pending tasks.
panels.title: "Compaction" pending tasks

panels.description:
Compaction is a process that merge SSTable files to delete duplicate data or old data.

This metric shows total bytes that had be compacted
panels.title: Bytes compacted

panels.description: The hints is a pending write, is a note to write data latter.
panels.title: Total "Hints"

panels.description: The hints is a pending write, is a note to will write data later.
panels.title: Total Hints in progress

panels.description: The reparations are the synchronization process of nodes. The next metrics shows total of bytes that should be repair.
panels.title: Bytes pending to repair

panels.description: Threadpools are multiple tasks by pool or by type tasks
panels.title: Total active tasks

panels.description: Multiple tasks by pool or by type tasks
panels.title: Pending tasks

title: Cassandra metrics
